      private void doUpdate(TableColumn.CellEditEvent<Caregiver,String> t)

      Parameters:

    • readAllAndShowInTableView

      private void readAllAndShowInTableView()
      calls readAll in CaregiverDAO and shows caregivers in the table

    • handleDeleteRow

      public void handleDeleteRow()
      handles a delete-click-event. Calls the delete methods in the CaregiverDAO and TreatmentDAO

    • handleAdd

      public void handleAdd()
      handles a add-click-event. Creates a caregiver and calls the create method in the CaregiverDAO

    • clearTextfields

      removes content from all textfields
